scene_description: Construction site with multiple workers pouring and finishing concrete. An excavator is visible in the background. A heat prevention chart is overlaid, indicating a temperature of 96 degrees Fahrenheit. Workers are engaged in strenuous physical labor under direct sunlight.
safety_response: Implement immediate heat stress prevention protocols. Ensure frequent water breaks, provide shaded rest areas, monitor workers for signs of heat-related illness, and consider adjusting work schedules to avoid peak heat hours. Ensure adequate hydration is available and encouraged for all workers.
